titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-600, by Mr. Reynolds.
Provides for the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules on Wednesday, May 3, 2000. Also, H. Res. 469 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 213.

bill.summary: 5/2/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on May 3, 2000, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
